page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN RAMSBOTTOM
page.content: Most of the people who live in Ramsbottom tend to work in Ramsbottom. They are mainly{skilled and {semi-skilled workers.}There are many large factories e.g. T.N.T. an international haulage company, Cormar Carpets, F.D. Sims a wire works and Trinity Paper Mill to mention but a few. Most{travel to work}on foot or by bicycle as they live close by. Ramsbottom does not experience a large movement of traffic in the mornings or evenings because of the large local element of its work force. Ramsbottom does not have a large {unemployment}problem as she has never solely relied on old heavy industry, as have other Northern towns which are now suffering due to their total reliance on such. {Paper} is the main single product of the town.
